extendedInfo.description: Have you ever lost track of time while taking a shower? Or maybe it just happens while browsing reddit, gaming or getting ready to go out? Then this app is for you!The Speaking Clock reminds you the time at a customizable interval.It supports speaking in Spanish, English, German, Italian and French. The app itself is available only in English and Spanish.The INTERNET permission is for AdMob (Ads) and the WAKE_LOCKis required to be able to speak with the screen off.search terms: speak clock reloj habla

reviews.title: excellence n simplicity
reviews.comment: this small, simple & subtle app does all that\'s required, m really happy with this.. simple to use, simple to turn it on and off I just wish they were moreally voices!
reviews.author: piyush Sharma

reviews.title: Wonderful for my ADHD :)
reviews.comment: Simple app does exactly what it says, nothing more and nothing less. A huge help in keeping track of the time when I\'m rushing around in the morning and when I\'m taking breaks from studying. I love it :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best talking clock !!!
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried all the talking clocks this one is better and tops all. Very convenient for people who don\'t want to look disrespectful when at work and don\'t want to look at the phone for time. Saves time not reaching in ur pocket too.I use a Bluetooth with this

reviews.comment: would be useful if i could set the media volume. the app seems to keep setting max volume.

reviews.comment: Must use with \"screen on \"app so that regular announcement of time can be made even with screen lock .works good on HTC wildfire s
